short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enjoy thousands of free games from Miniplay.com with this Chrome extension!
short.es: ¡Disfruta de miles de juegos gratis de Minijuegos.com con esta extensión de Chrome!
short.it: Goditi i migliaia di giochi gratis di Minigiochi.com con questa estensione di Chrome!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
MINIPLAY Chrome Extension
Thanks to this extension you can play in your Chrome browser to the latest games added at Miniplay.com

Have quick access with a single click to your user profile, your favorite games or new and awesome game recommendations.

Give our extension a try and let me know what you think, feedback is appreciated!
Feel free to send us an email @ chrome@minijuegos.com
